name: Broccoli Cornbread with Cheese
author: Susie P
summary: This moist bread with a sweet corn flavor can be served as a side dish with any meaty entree. Adding Cheddar cheese helps seal the deal to convert the picky broccoli hater.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
1 ½ cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Beat cottage cheese, butter, and eggs in a large bowl
Stir corn bread mixes into butter mixture until just moistened
Fold in broccoli, onion, and 1 cup Cheddar cheese
Pour batter into prepared baking dish and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 35 to 40 minutes
Cool in the baking dish for 10 minutes before slicing and serving warm
